Ribosome - Syntax files for CCHS estimation

Welcome to Ribosome

Code with confidence, using a standard collection of dummy coding files.

Ribosome is an open community initative for standardized CCHS analysis using SAS. Quickly generate analysis-ready data, or build an entire analysis program with our macro components.

Get started

Super Simple.

Ribosome uses as little configuration as possible to keep the learning curve flat. Working with it is a cinch!

Really Reliable.

By using a central repository, the analysis will work the same on any system.

Clearly Collaborative.

We leverage the shared experience of analysts and researchers to reduce duplication of problem-solving.

Quick Start

Two lines of code is all you need to get up and running!

filename foo url "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WatDurCodeGroup/ribosome/master/dist/main.min.sas";
%include foo;

Lean more with some examples, or dive straight into the documentation.
